item_prototype.name: MySQL:$1:active thread ratio
item_prototype.description: 非睡眠线程比例

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$1:All delete operations number per second
item_prototype.description: 请求执行的delete语句（com_delete+com_delete_multi）的和。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$1:key_cache_hit_rate
item_prototype.description: key cache 15分钟命中率

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$1:Innodb_buffer_pool_pages_misc
item_prototype.description: the total number of pages in the innodb buffer pool that are busy because they have been allocated for administrative overhead,such as row locks or the adaptive hash index. 缓冲池中被分配作为管理型任务的page的数量。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$1:MySQL status
item_prototype.description:
It requires user parameter mysql.ping, which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.
0 - MySQL server is down 1 - MySQL server is up

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$1:Innodb_buffer_pool_pages_free
item_prototype.description: the number of free pages in the innodb buffer pool; 缓冲池中空闲的页数量

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Com_begin
item_prototype.description: the number of cached privilege objects. Each object is the privilege combination of a user and its active role. 缓存的权限对象的数量。每一个权限对象都结合了一个用户和它激活的角色。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Handler_mrr_init
item_prototype.description: the number of times the server uses a storage engine's own multi-range read implementation for table access. server在表访问时使用存储引擎的多范围读实现的次数

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Aborted_clients
item_prototype.description: The number of connections that were aborted because the client died without closing the connection properly. 因为客户端没有关闭连接而被abort的连接数。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Aborted_connects
item_prototype.description: The number of failed attempts to connect to the MySQL server. 没能成功连接到mysql的连接尝试的数量。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Acl_cache_items_count
item_prototype.description: the number of cached privilege objects. Each object is the privilege combination of a user and its active role. 缓存的权限对象的数量。每一个权限对象都结合了一个用户和它激活的角色。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Binlog_cache_disk_use
item_prototype.description: numbers of transactions that used the temporary binary log cache but that exceed the value of binlog_cache_size and use temporary file to store statements for the transaction. 事务的数量。使用临时的binlog日志缓存内存但是超过了binlog_cache_size指定的内存大小而将事务语句溢出到磁盘临时文件的事务量。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Binlog_cache_use
item_prototype.description: the number of transactions that used the binlog cache. 使用了binlog缓存内存的事务的数量。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Binlog_stmt_cache_disk_use
item_prototype.description: the number of nontransaction statements that used the binary log statement cache but thar exceed the value of binlog_stmt_cache_size and used temporary file to store the those statements; 非事务语句的数量。使用binlog语句缓存内存，但是超出了binlog_stmt_cache_size指定大小，而将语句存储溢出到磁盘临时文件的语句数量。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Binlog_stmt_cache_use
item_prototype.description: the number of nontransactions that used binary log statement cache. 使用二进制日志语句缓存内存的非事务语句的数量。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:MySQL bytes received per second
item_prototype.description: The number of bytes received from all clients. 从所有客户端接收的字节数。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:MySQL bytes sent per second
item_prototype.description: The number of bytes sent to all clients. 发送到所有客户端的字节数。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2: Com_commit operations per second
item_prototype.description: com_xxx语句的请求执行次数。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Connections
item_prototype.description: the number of connections attempts (success or not) to the MySQL server. 尝试连接到mysql服务器的连接的数量（成功或者失败）

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Connection_errors_accept
item_prototype.description: 以com_error_xxx开始的变量统计了在连接过程中的各阶段产生的错误。这些错误不包括在host cache中统计的错误。 these variables provides information about errors thar occurs duing the client connection process. they are global and represent error counts aggregated across connections from all hosts. these variables track errors not accounted for by the host cache.

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Connection_errors_internal
item_prototype.description: 以com_error_xxx开始的变量统计了在连接过程中的各阶段产生的错误。这些错误不包括在host cache中统计的错误。 these variables provides information about errors thar occurs duing the client connection process. they are global and represent error counts aggregated across connections from all hosts. these variables track errors not accounted for by the host cache. 由于服务器内部错误导致的被拒绝的连接的数量。例如不能启动新线程 、内存不足等。 the number of connections refused due to internal errors in the server, such as failure to start new thread or an out-of-memory condition.

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Connection_errors_max_connections
item_prototype.description: 以com_error_xxx开始的变量统计了在连接过程中的各阶段产生的错误。这些错误不包括在host cache中统计的错误。 these variables provides information about errors thar occurs duing the client connection process. they are global and represent error counts aggregated across connections from all hosts. these variables track errors not accounted for by the host cache. 由于达到max_connections限制而被服务器拒绝的连接数。 the number of connections refused because the server max_connections limit was reached.

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Connection_errors_peer_address
item_prototype.description: 以com_error_xxx开始的变量统计了在连接过程中的各阶段产生的错误。这些错误不包括在host cache中统计的错误。 these variables provides information about errors thar occurs duing the client connection process. they are global and represent error counts aggregated across connections from all hosts. these variables track errors not accounted for by the host cache. 当在搜索客户端连接ip地址时发生的错误数。 the number of errors that occurred while searching for connecting client ip address.

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Connection_errors_select
item_prototype.description: 以com_error_xxx开始的变量统计了在连接过程中的各阶段产生的错误。这些错误不包括在host cache中统计的错误。 these variables provides information about errors thar occurs duing the client connection process. they are global and represent error counts aggregated across connections from all hosts. these variables track errors not accounted for by the host cache. 在监听端口上调用select()或者poll()函数调用期间产生的错误数。这个错误并不一定会导致连接被拒绝。 the number of errors that occured during calls to select() or poll() on listening port. (Failure of this operation does not necessarily means a client connection was rejected)

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Connection_errors_tcpwrap
item_prototype.description: 以com_error_xxx开始的变量统计了在连接过程中的各阶段产生的错误。这些错误不包括在host cache中统计的错误。 these variables provides information about errors thar occurs duing the client connection process. they are global and represent error counts aggregated across connections from all hosts. these variables track errors not accounted for by the host cache. 被libwrap库拒绝的连接。 the number of connections refused by the libwrap library.

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Created_tmp_disk_tables
item_prototype.description: The number of internal on-disk temporary tables created by the server while executing statements. 内部临时磁盘表的数量。在sql执行过程中，由server创建的内部磁盘临时表的数量。 这个计数并没有包括temptable_use_mmap启用后，通过mmap映射文件方式生成的磁盘临时表。 created_tmp_tables表征总的server创建的内部临时表的数量。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Created_tmp_files
item_prototype.description: how many temp files mysqld has create. mysqld 创建的临时文件的数量

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Created_tmp_tables
MySQL:$2:fil_n_pending_log_flushes
item_prototype.description: the number of pending fsync() operations for the innodb redo log files. 挂起的redo日志fsync操作的数量。在fsync之前++，之后--。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Flush_commands
item_prototype.description: The number of times the server flush tables, whether because a user exected a flush tables statement or due to internal server operation. server刷新表的次数，无论是用户手动操作还是server自动执行。 与com_flush不同的是，com_flush包括了所有的flush操作，例如flush tables, flush logs 等。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Handler_commit
item_prototype.description: The number of internal commit statements 内部的commit语句的数量。可以理解为执行dml语句的数量。无论是否开启事务。也无论是否显式commit或rollback。 一条dml语句执行成功，即使dml语句没有修改任何数据，这个值也会加1。执行失败，这个值不变。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Handler_delete
item_prototype.description: the number of times that rows have been deleted from tables 从表中删除行的次数

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Handler_external_lock
item_prototype.description: the number of times that external_lock() function been called which general occures at the begining and end of access to a table instance. 对于external_lock()函数的调用次数，通常在对一个表实例访问的开始和结束时调用。这个参数可以用来计算分区表的分区裁剪数量。 裁剪的分区数 = 总分区数 - 锁定的分区数 锁定的分区数=(Handler_external_lock的增量 - 2(对表实例本身的锁定) ) / 2

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Handler_prepare
item_prototype.description: a counter for the prepare phase of two-phrase commit operations; 两阶段提交中的prepare阶段的计数。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Handler_read_first
item_prototype.description: the number of times the first entry in an index was read. 索引的第一个条目被访问的次数。如果这个值很高的话，可能潜在的有过多的全索引扫描。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Handler_read_key
item_prototype.description: the number of requests to read a row based on a key. 基于一个key读取一行记录的请求的数量。 这个值越高反应索引的设计较为合理。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Handler_read_last
item_prototype.description: the number of requests to read the last key in an index. 读取一个索引的最后一个key的请求次数。 通常，order by被server实现为一个first key读取后跟随多个next key读取请求；order by desc 被实现为一个last key读取后跟随多个previous-key读取请求。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Handler_read_next
item_prototype.description: the number of requests to read the next row in key order. 按照索引的key顺序读取下一个key的请求的数量。 通常这预示着索引范围扫描。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Handler_read_prev
item_prototype.description: the number of requests to read the previous row in key order. 按照key顺序读取上一行的请求的数量。 通常是order by desc的行为。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Handler_read_rnd
item_prototype.description: the number of requests to read a row based on a fixed position. 根据固定位置读取一行的请求执行的次数。本质统计的是对handler::rnd_pos()的调用次数。如果这个值很高的话，表明有很多的查询需要对结果集进行排序。上面一段原文中说基于一个固定位置读取一行记录。对于“fixed position”可能正确的一个解释来自这里：https://www.percona.com/blog/2010/06/15/what-does-handler_read_rnd-mean/ Why would either of these be called? Usually Handler_read_rnd is called when a sort operation gathers a list of tuples and their “position” values, sorts the tuples by some criterion, and then traverses the sorted list, using the position to fetch each one. This is quite likely to result in retrieving rows from random points in the table, although that might not actually result in random IO if the data is all in memory. Handler_read_rnd_next is usually called for each row of a full or partial table scan. Handler_read_rnd调用发生在这种情况：当一个排序操作收集了一些列元素和他们的位置值(主键值)，并且根据某些条件排序，然后遍历这个有序列表，并使用这个“fixed position(主键)”固定位置来从表中获取一行记录。从主键来看，这是一个固定位置，从表来看，这是一个随机位置。 Handler_read_rnd_next通常用于从一个全表或者部分表扫描中的每一行进行一次调用。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Handler_read_rnd_next
item_prototype.description: the number of requests to read the next row in the data file. 从数据文件中读取一行记录的请求的数量。这个通常是全表扫描或者部分表扫描(select ... limit...) 过高的值预示着过高的全表扫描或者大表的全表扫描。 在单次全表扫描测试中，这个值等于表的行数+1。多出来一行的逻辑在于，程序并不知道表数据是否已读完了，当最后一行读取结束后，程序会接着发起下一次的Handler_read_rnd_next，这时候发生EOF错误，确保表的所有记录都被读取。 在部分表扫描时，等于读取的行数。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Handler_rollback
item_prototype.description: the number of request for a storage engine to perform a rollback operation; 存储引擎执行回滚操作的请求数。 这里强调了“存储引擎”。 总结的原则，分为已产生的变更和未产生的变更两类。回滚时会针对两类数据分别累计一次Handler_rollback。如下为详细： 当dml语句执行失败时，server自动回滚当前的sql。此时，如果当前sql在错误发生前，已修改了记录，则Handler_rollback值增加2，否则值增加1。显式执行rollback时，如果事务中已经产生了变更，则Handler_rollback增加2；如果事务中有失败的dml导致自动rollback，则Handler_rollback增加1；如果两种情况都没有，那Handler_rollback不变化。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Handler_update
MySQL:$2:Handler_write
item_prototype.description: the number of requests to insert a row in a table. 同样，不论成败，只记请求数。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Innodb_buffer_pool_bytes_data
item_prototype.description: the total number of bytes in the innodb buffer pool containing data. the number includes both dirty and clean pages. buffer pool中包含数据的内存的字节数。这个值包括了脏的和干净的页，但是不包括free的页。与Innodb_buffer_pool_pages_data不同，后者指页数。但是因为压缩表的存在，Innodb_buffer_pool_pages_data可能大于Innodb_buffer_pool_pages_total。其中的逻辑在于，Innodb_buffer_pool_pages_data包含了未压缩的页帧，其位于LRU列表中，而Innodb_buffer_pool_pages_total则是来自于缓冲池的总页数，对于4k的压缩页，缓冲池中的一个页（假设16k），可以存储4个4k的压缩页。因此极端情况下，Innodb_buffer_pool_pages_data可能4倍于Innodb_buffer_pool_pages_total。 https://bugs.mysql.com/bug.php?id=59550 对于Innodb_buffer_pool_pages_misc，如果按照 Innodb_buffer_pool_pages_misc=Innodb_buffer_pool_pages_total -Innodb_buffer_pool_pages_data - Innodb_buffer_pool_pages_free 公式计算，则可能产生负数溢出，最终导致一个非常大的计算结果。 更好的一个计算公式： Innodb_buffer_pool_pages_misc = Innodb_buffer_pool_pages_total - Innodb_buffer_pool_bytes_data/innodb_page_size - Innodb_buffer_pool_pages_free

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Innodb_buffer_pool_bytes_dirty
item_prototype.description: the total current number of bytes held in dirty pages in the innodb buffer pool. 脏页占用的字节空间大小。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Innodb_buffer_pool_pages_flushed
item_prototype.description: the number of requests to flush pages from the innodb buffer pool. 文档中的描述是从缓冲池中刷新页的请求数。但是代码中实际是刷新的page的数量。所以这里的请求数可理解为一次刷新请求只刷新一个page。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Innodb_buffer_pool_reads
item_prototype.description: the number of logical reads that innodb could not satisfy from the buffer pool, and had to read directly from disk. 因为page不存在缓冲池中，需要从磁盘上读取的逻辑读的数量。实际上是逻辑读对应的物理读取的页数量。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Innodb_buffer_pool_read_ahead
item_prototype.description: the number of pages read into the innodb buffer pool by the read-ahead background thread. 被预读后台线程预读进缓冲池的page的数量。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Innodb_buffer_pool_read_ahead_evicted
item_prototype.description: the number of pages read into the innodb buffer pool by the read-ahead background thread that were subsequently evicted without having been accessed by queries. 被预读进缓冲池后，没有被查询访问过就被从缓冲池刷掉的页数量。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Innodb_buffer_pool_read_ahead_rnd
item_prototype.description: the number of "random" read-ahead initiated by innodb.this happens when a query scans a large portion of a table but in random order. innodb随机预读的页的数量。这种情况通常发生在查询以随机顺序访问一张表的很大一部分。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Innodb_buffer_pool_read_requests
item_prototype.description: the number of logical read requests. 文档的意思是逻辑读请求的数量。实际是逻辑读的页的数量。逻辑读可能伴随物理读。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Innodb_buffer_pool_wait_free
item_prototype.description: normally,writes to the innodb buffer pool happen in the background. when innodb need to read or create a page and no clean pages are avaliable, innodb flush some dirty pages first and wait for that operation to finish.this counter counts instances of these waits. 通常，缓冲池中的脏页是在后台线程中写入到磁盘的。当innodb需要从磁盘读取一个页到缓冲区或者在缓冲区创建一个页，但是缓冲区中没有干净的(free+data(dirty/nodirty))页的时候，innodb会发起一个刷新操作，从缓冲池中刷新一些脏页到磁盘并等待这个操作完成。这个指标统计了这种等待的次数。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Innodb_buffer_pool_write_requests
item_prototype.description: the number of writes done to the innodb buffer pool. this function should be called at a mini-transaction commit, if a page was modified in it, Puts the block to the list of modified blocks, if it is not already in it. 缓冲池中被修改的页的数量。这个值在函数buf_flush_note_modification中增加，每一个block增加1。此函数的作用是在事务提交的时候，将此事务修改的页放入修改块列表。如果一个block被多个事务修改，则累加多次。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Innodb_data_fsyncs
item_prototype.description: the number of fsync() so far. 截止到目前fsync()调用的次数。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Innodb_data_pending_fsyncs
item_prototype.description: the current number of pendng fsync() operations. 当前挂起的fsync操作的数量。在fil0fil.cc文件void Fil_shard::space_flush(space_id_t space_id)方法中，在fsync调用前，变量++，fsync调用后，变量--。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Innodb_data_pending_reads
item_prototype.description: the current number of pending reads。 当前挂起的文件读的数量。os0file.cc文件中os_file_pread(IORequest &type, os_file_t file, void *buf, ulint n, os_offset_t offset, dberr_t *err)是一个同步（synchronous）读方法，在方法中，具体的读操作前os_n_pending_reads++，读操作后os_n_pending_reads--。既然是同步io，所以这个值的最大值可能等于innodb_read_io_threads的数量。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Innodb_data_pending_writes
item_prototype.description: the current number of pending writes; 挂起的写文件操作的数量。os0file.cc文件中os_file_pwrite(IORequest &type, os_file_t file, const byte *buf, ulint n, os_offset_t offset, dberr_t *err)是一个同步写的方法，在其中真正写之前os_n_pending_writes++，写之后os_n_pending_writes--。因为是同步方法，推测此变量最大值为innodb_write_io_threads。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Innodb_data_read
item_prototype.description: the amount of data read since the server start( in bytes). 自server启动以来innodb文件io读取的字节数。这里是真正的文件io，是物理读，不是逻辑读。包括了redo日志和表数据（当然也包括undo）

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Innodb_data_reads
item_prototype.description: the total number of data reads(os file reads). os文件读取的总次数。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Innodb_data_writes
item_prototype.description: the total number of data writes; 总的文件写的次数。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Innodb_data_written
item_prototype.description: the amount of data written so far(in byte). 总的写入文件的字节数。包括了redo日志和表数据（当然也包括undo）。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Innodb_dblwr_pages_written
item_prototype.description: the number of pages that have been written to doublewrite buffer. 写入到双写缓冲区的页的数量。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Innodb_dblwr_writes
item_prototype.description: the number of doublewrite operations that have been performed. 截止目前已经执行的双写缓冲区批次写入操作的数量。需要注意的是，一次双写批次写入会写入多个page。因此平均每次操作写入的页数可以通过Innodb_dblwr_pages_written/Innodb_dblwr_writes计算

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Innodb_log_waits
item_prototype.description: the number of times that the log buffer was too small and a wait was required for it to be flushed before continuing. 由于redo缓冲区太小，导致必须等待其中的内容被刷出才能继续写入的等待次数。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Innodb_log_writes
item_prototype.description: the number of physical writers to the innodb redo log file. redo日志物理写的次数。 根据log0write.cc文件中的注释所描述，redo日志刷新有4个后台线程：1,log writer负责将数据从log buffer或者write-ahead buffer写到os buffer；2，log flusher负责将数据从os buffer 进行flush到磁盘硬件(fsync调用）；3，log writer notifier通知用户线程(commit是由用户线程发起，并等待redo写入磁盘)写入到os buffer已完成；4，log flusher notifier通知用户线程写入到磁盘已完成；5，log closer线程负责追踪所有添加到flush list的log pages的lsn，6 log checkpointer线程做的估计跟oracle的检查点进程是一回事。 这个指标发生在log writer线程将数据从log buffer写入到os buffer的过程中。记录了这个线程写数据的次数。注意，log buffer是采用的批量写的，一次写入一批数据。平均单次写入的大小可以通过Innodb_os_log_written/Innodb_log_writes计算。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Innodb_log_write_requests
item_prototype.description:
the number of write request for the innodb redo log. 按照log0buf.cc中的注释所描述的，redo日志的写入经过几个步骤：1，mtr提交的时候，在redo log buffer中申请一块保留区；2，将redo日志内容从用户线程内存copy到log buffer中申请的保留区；3，添加到最近写的log buffer的链接；4，添加到最近closed的log buffer的链接。第3、4步是为了执行检查点进程时确定可以推进的lsn。 这个参数处于log_buffer_reserve函数中调用，属于1步骤。按照其中的注释描述：/* In 5.7, we incremented log_write_requests for each single write to log buffer in commit of mini transaction.
However, writes which were solved by log_reserve_and_write_fast missed to increment the counter. Therefore it wasn't reliable.
Dimitri and I have decided to change meaning of the counter to reflect mtr commit rate. */ 只有mtr 提交的时候才会经过这里的1,2,3,4步骤，因此，这个指标值表征的是mtr提交的量。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Innodb_num_open_files
item_prototype.description: the number of files Innodb currently holds on. innodb当前持有的文件的数量。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Innodb_os_log_fsyncs
item_prototype.description: the number of fsync() writes done to the innodb redo log files. redo日志fsync调用的次数。 根据log0write.cc文件中的注释所描述，redo日志刷新有4个后台线程：1,log writer负责将数据从log buffer或者write-ahead buffer写到os buffer；2，log flusher负责将数据从os buffer 进行flush到磁盘硬件(fsync调用）；3，log writer notifier通知用户线程(commit是由用户线程发起，并等待redo写入磁盘)写入到os buffer已完成；4，log flusher notifier通知用户线程写入到磁盘已完成；5，log closer线程负责追踪所有添加到flush list的log pages的lsn，6 log checkpointer线程做的估计跟oracle的检查点进程是一回事。 所以这个指标发生在log flusher线程中。每次flush的字节数可以通过Innodb_os_log_written/Innodb_os_log_fsyncs计算。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Innodb_os_log_pending_writes
item_prototype.description: The number of pending writes to the InnoDB redo log files. 从log buffer写出到redo log文件的挂起数量。在物理写之前++，物理写完成后--

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Innodb_os_log_written
item_prototype.description: the number of bytes written to the innodb redo log files. 写出到redo日志文件的字节数。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Innodb_pages_created
item_prototype.description: the number of pages created by operations on innodb tables. 发生在innodb表上的页创建操作的页数。 当一个innodb表创建后，会创建对应的ibd文件，文件会划分为一个一个的block，文件初始大小为7个page（16k页大小）。每一个block根据自身的目的不同，在填充数据的时候，需要先初始化一个格式，这个过程就称为页创建。这个指标表征随着表大小增长，数据文件中被初始化的块的数量。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Innodb_pages_read
item_prototype.description: the number of pages read from the innodb buffer pool by operations on innodb tables. 异步io。这个指标在函数buf_page_io_complete中累加，此函数的作用为Completes an asynchronous read or write request of a file page to or from the buffer pool.这个函数用于处理异步io（read or write）的请求完成。因此，这是一个物理读写。mysql通过判断fetch_mode是否为Page_fetch::SCAN来决定使用异步或者同步io从磁盘读入buffer。对于可能只访问一次的block，例如全表扫描、预读等读取，使用异步io方式。innodb_pages_read从值上来说应该略小于innodb_buffer_pool_reads大小，但是应该相差不大。原因是Innodb_pages_read只统计了因为表操作导致的异步io读，innodb_buffer_pool_reads统计的是所有从磁盘读取到buffer的页数，包括了所有的同步、异步io读取的pages。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Innodb_pages_written
item_prototype.description: The number of pages written by operations on InnoDB tables. 通过各种方式写入磁盘的数据文件（包括tempfile，tablespacefile ，当然import操作也是要经过buffer pool写入到对应datafile的。不包括logfile、doublewrite 文件）的page的数量。 Innodb_pages_written指标在buf0buf.cc文件bool buf_page_io_complete(buf_page_t *bpage, bool evict = false)函数中累加，buf_page_io_complete对于写的累加来自于buf0dblwr.cc、fil0filc.cc文件中调用。buf0dblwr.cc中主要是因为所有写入datafile的page必须先写入doublewrite buffer文件（如果禁用doublewrite的话，就不写了，但是也要经过buf0dblwr.cc中dberr_t dblwr::write(buf_flush_t flush_type, buf_page_t *bpage,bool sync) 函数的入口进行分发处理）。dblwr::write中有同步io方式写入和异步io方式写入两种，同步与异步io的区别在于对datafile的写入是同步或者异步，对于doublewrite buffer的写入都是以同步segment批量的方式写入的。fil0filc.cc中的void fil_aio_wait(ulint segment)方法主要是用来累积异步io方式写入datafile的的pages的数量。 与Innodb_dblwr_pages_written指标的差异在于，在doublewrite启用的情况下，tempfile的写入是不需要先写doublewrite的，因此Innodb_pages_written-Innodb_dblwr_pages_written=写入临时文件的页数； 与os_n_file_writes的区别在于：首先，os_n_file_writes是写入的次数，并非pages数量；其次os_n_file_writes是所有写入物理文件的写次数，包括redo logfile，datafile，archive归档日志等innodb 引擎使用到的所有的物理文件的写入。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Innodb_rows_deleted
item_prototype.description: the number of rows deleted from innodb tables. 从innnodb中删除的行数。即使事务回滚了，对于Innodb_rows_deleted的累加也不会减少。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Innodb_rows_inserted
item_prototype.description: the number of rows inserted into innodb tables; 插入到innodb表中的行数。事务回滚不影响值的累加。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Innodb_rows_read
item_prototype.description: the number of rows read from innodb tables; 从innodb表中读取的行数。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Innodb_rows_updated
item_prototype.description: the number of rows updated to innodb tables; innodb表更新的行数。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Innodb_row_lock_current_waits
item_prototype.description: the number of row locks currently being waited for operations on innodb tables; 当前innodb表上发生的行锁等待的数量。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Innodb_row_lock_time
item_prototype.description: the total time spent in acquiring row locks for innodb tables,in milliseconds. 以毫秒为单位的，发生在行锁等待上的总时间。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Innodb_row_lock_waits
item_prototype.description: the number of times operations on innodb tables had to wait for a row lock. 截止到目前，发生的行锁等待的总次数。 与Innodb_row_lock_current_waits在同一个函数中累加，区别是Innodb_row_lock_current_waits在行锁获得后会递减。而Innodb_row_lock_waits是一个累加值。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Innodb_system_rows_deleted
item_prototype.description: the number of rows deleted from innodb tables belonging to system-created schemas. 从系统数据库中的innodb表中删除的行数。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Innodb_system_rows_inserted
item_prototype.description: the number of rows inserted into innodb tables belonging to system-created schemas. 插入到属于系统schema的innodb表中的行数

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Innodb_system_rows_read
item_prototype.description: 从系统schema的innodb表中读取的行数

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Innodb_undo_tablespaces_active
item_prototype.description: the number of active undo tablespace. 激活的undo表空间的数量。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Innodb_undo_tablespaces_explicit
item_prototype.description: the number of user-created undo tablespaces. 显式/用户创建的undo表空间的数量。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Innodb_undo_tablespaces_implicit
item_prototype.description: the number of undotablespace created by innodb; 隐式/innodb创建的undo表空间的数量。innodb初始化会默认创建两个undo表空间。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Innodb_undo_tablespaces_total
item_prototype.description: the total number of undo tablespaces. 总的undo表空间的数量。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Key_blocks_not_flushed
item_prototype.description: the number of key blocks in the MyISAM key cache that have changed but have not yet been flushed to disk. MyISAM key缓存中已经修改未刷新到磁盘的block的数量。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Key_blocks_unused
item_prototype.description: the number of unused blocks in the MyISAM key cache. MyISAM key缓存未使用的block的数量。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Key_reads
item_prototype.description: the number of physical reads of a key block from disk into the MyISAM key cache. 从磁盘读入到key cahce的物理读block的数量。 key cache的命中率计算 1- (Key_reads/Key_read_requests)

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Key_read_requests
item_prototype.description: the number of requests to read a key block from the MyISAM key cache. key cache的逻辑读请求数。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Key_writes
item_prototype.description: the number of physical writes a key block from the MyISAM key cache to disk. 从MyISAM key cache中写出到磁盘的块的数量。物理写。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Key_write_requests
item_prototype.description: the number of requests to write a key block to the MyISAM key cache. 写入到key cahce的block的数量。逻辑写。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Opened_tables
item_prototype.description: the number of tables that have been opened. 表open的累积数量。越多的话，表明table_open_cache较小，需要增大。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Open_tables
item_prototype.description: the number of tables that are open. 打开的表的数量。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Open_table_definitions
item_prototype.description: the number of cached table definitions. 缓存的表定义的数量

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Prepared_stmt_count
item_prototype.description: the current number of prepared statements. 当前prepared语句的数量。最大的prepare 语句数量由参数max_prepared_stmt_count参数指定

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Queries
item_prototype.description: the number of statements executed by the server. this variable includes statements executed within stored programs, unlike the questions variable. it does not count COM_PING and COM_STATISTICS commands. 由server执行的语句的数量。与questions不同在于，此变量包括存储程序中执行的语句。 此变量不包括com_ping和com_statistic语句。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Questions
item_prototype.description: the number of statements executed by the server. this include only statement send to the server by clients and not executed within store programs. 由server执行的语句的数量，与queries不同的是，此变量仅包含由客户端发送的server的语句，并不统计在存储程序内部执行的语句。 这个变量不统计COM_PING、COM_STATSTISTICS、COM_STMT_PREPARE、COM_STMT_CLOSE、COM_STMT_RESET语句。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Select_full_join
item_prototype.description: the number of joins that perform table scans because they do not use index. 执行表扫描的连接的数量。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Slave_open_temp_tables
item_prototype.description: the number of temporary tables the the replication sql thread current have open. 复制sql线程当前打开的临时表的数量。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Slow_queries
item_prototype.description: the number of queries that have taken more then long_query_time seconds. 超过慢查询阈值的查询的数量。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Sort_merge_passes
item_prototype.description: the number of merge pass that the sort algorithm had had to do. 由于sort_buffer_size太小，而导致的排序过程中产生的merge pass的次数。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Table_locks_immediate
item_prototype.description: the number of times that a table lock could be grant immediately. 请求的表锁可以立即被获得的次数。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Table_locks_waited
item_prototype.description: the number of times that a request for a table lock could not be granted immediately and a wait was needed. 请求的表锁不能立即获得的次数。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Table_open_cache_hits
item_prototype.description: the number of hits for open tables cache lookups. 需要open表时，可以在表缓存中找到此表的未使用缓存条目的次数。也即表缓存命中次数。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Table_open_cache_misses
item_prototype.description: the number of misses for open tables cache lookups. 表缓存未命中次数。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Table_open_cache_overflows
item_prototype.description: the number of overflows for the open tables cache 表缓存溢出次数。这个指标是在open或者close表时，如果当前cache instance的设定大小小于于实际容纳大小，并且表缓存中存在未使用的表缓存条目，则会按照LRU算法进行关闭表缓存条目，并循环此步骤。此变量在关闭时累加。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Threads_cached
item_prototype.description: the number of threads in the thread cache. 处于缓存中的线程的数量。当客户端断开连接时，线程会被缓存起来，用于下次连接分配。当没有处于缓存状态的线程时，才会创建新线程。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Threads_connected
item_prototype.description: the number of currently open connections; 当前打开的连接的数量。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Threads_created
item_prototype.description: the number of thread created to handle connections. 线程被创建的次数。当没有处于缓存状态的线程时，才会创建新线程。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Threads_running
item_prototype.description: the number of threads that are not sleeping. 线程状态为未休眠状态的线程数量。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Thread_pool_query_threads
item_prototype.description: the total number of query work threads in the thread pool. 线程池中进行查询工作的线程的数量。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Key_reads_mid
item_prototype.description: key cache物理读数量。用于计算命中率。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Key_read_requests_mid
item_prototype.description: key cache逻辑读数量，用于计算命中率

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Queries_mid
item_prototype.description: 查询执行的数量，用于计算慢查询占比。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$2:Slow_queries_mid
item_prototype.description: 慢查询数量。用于计算慢查询占整个查询的比值。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$1:pages of each doublewrite operation
item_prototype.description: 计算双写操作平均批次页数。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$1:redo_log_averate_write_bytes
item_prototype.description: 根据Innodb_os_log_written/Innodb_log_writes计算出来的平均每次写多少字节数。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$1:slow_queries_rate
item_prototype.description: 慢查询占所有查询的比重。

item_prototype.name: MySQL:$1:table_cache_hit_ratio
item_prototype.description: table_open_cache缓存命中率
